articles.title: Charlie Kirk Shooting Suspect in Custody, Says Donald Trump
articles.description: A suspect in the fatal shooting of conservative activist Charlie Kirk has been taken into custody. The arrest was announced by former President Donald Trump, who stated that someone close to the suspect had turned him in. Kirk was shot and killed during an event at a university in Utah, sparking widespread shock and renewing concerns about political violence.

articles.title: Sushila Karki To Become Interim PM, Nepal Protests Leave 51 Dead
articles.description: Following days of violent anti-corruption protests that have resulted in at least 51 deaths, former Chief Justice Sushila Karki is set to become the interim Prime Minister of Nepal. The protests have created significant political upheaval, leading to the collapse of the previous government.

articles.title: Russia and Belarus start military exercise near NATO border after drone incursion
articles.description: Russia and its ally Belarus have commenced a large-scale joint military exercise named 'Zapad-2025' near the border with NATO countries. This show of force, involving drills in both nations as well as the Baltic and Barents seas, comes at a time of heightened tensions, particularly following a recent incident where Poland shot down suspected Russian drones over its airspace.
